data.name: Secret Garden - Artwork
data.detailed_description: These are original artworks in original resolution. They are located in the game folder, inside "Artwork" you will find a folder "Non-nude" with girls in clothes, "Nude" with girls without clothes and a folder "Bonus" with additional artworks.
data.about_the_game: These are original artworks in original resolution. They are located in the game folder, inside "Artwork" you will find a folder "Non-nude" with girls in clothes, "Nude" with girls without clothes and a folder "Bonus" with additional artworks.
data.short_description: These are original artworks in original resolution
data.supported_languages: English, Italian, Greek, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 95
  • Processor: Intel core 2 duo
  • Graphics: Geforce gtx 200
  • Storage: 75 MB available space
  • Sound Card: No
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel core i9
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 3090
  • Storage: 75 MB available space
  • Sound Card: No

  • Processor: Intel core 2 duo
  • Graphics: GeForce 500 series
  • Storage: 75 MB available space
  • Sound Card: No
linux_requirements.recommended:

content_descriptors.notes:
-Nudity or sexual content
-Not suitable for watching at work
-Not suitable for all ages
